index.js.name: index.js
index.js.description:
This is the main class in the CERES application. From here the program initializes
the server, router and start listening for requests for the server.

insert.name: insert
insert.description:
INSERT FUNCTION
This function calls the mongo database to insert the data and timestamp
parameter. It also add a server utc to record when the data was inserted
into the database.

return.description: Message on success or error code otherwise

params.name: object
params.description:
id: string

Purpose: This method is to delete a single record from the database based on the object id passed to it.

classitems.description:
*---- DeleteAll function ----*

Purpose: This method is to delete all records from the database. It is especially useful for maintenance purposes.

params.name: expression:
params.description:
string

Purpose: This method is for retrieving a record from the database that matches the query(i.e. expression).

classitems.description:
Loads OAuth secrets from the mongo collection specified in the oauth_collection variable of the ../config/mongodb.json config file.
This should be called by index.js.

Loads OAuth consumer keys and secrets into MongoDB.
They will be loaded into the collection specified as the oauth_collection in the mongodb.json config file.
This will REPLACE all oauth secrets in Mongo.
The oauth secrets are loaded from the file config/oauth-secrets.json .  After this script is executed, the oauth secrets in this file will
be the ONLY oauth secrets stored in Mongo.
To run, put all of the keys that you want in the db into the config file mentioned above and run:
$ node populate-oauth-secrets.js

*---- query validation function ----*

Purpose: This method is to validate the data and return boolean

*---- Request Handlers ----*

This is the main program that accepts client requests and call other functions.

params.name: query
params.description: The query string component of the URI

params.name: postData
params.description: The post data (parsed into an Object).

params.name: query
params.description: The query string component of the URI

params.name: postData
params.description: The post data (parsed into an Object). (should be empty for a metric request)

classitems.description: Decodes a query string in the form q=<URI-encoded JSON object>.

params.name: query
params.description: A query string in the form q=<URI-encoded JSON object>

return.description: An object created from the JSON, or null if there's an error.

params.name: a
params.description: string containing the object id to validate

return.description: true if it is 24 hex characters, false if not

classitems.description:
*---- Response Handlers ----*

This is the program that processes/generates responses for requests.

*---- Schema Validation ----*

This method validates the schema of the data and returns a boolean.

params.name: object
params.description:
id: string

Purpose: This method is to update an existing record in the database using the object id.
